alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 05 at 11:20AM PST until December 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest California, including the following areas, Coastal Del Norte, Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Coast, Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior and Southwestern Humboldt. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Soils have been saturated by recent rain. Over the next 36 hours, 2 to 5 inches of additional rainfall are expected over northern Humboldt and Del Norte. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt
